name: Top Trumps Adventures
overview: Welcome to the fabulous world of Top Trumps - Based on the classic card game, Top Trumps Adventures takes the experience to a whole new level. - Play against the computer or against your friends, enter quizzes and collect specials cards, and compete in single games and tournaments. - The gameplay opportunities are almost limitless, and the fun endless. Play against the computer or against friends Choose from 4 individual game genres Collect cards to display in your Wall Chart Now what are you waiting for? Let's play...
